short_summary: Loading equipment at Riding Mountain National Park
description: Parks Canada requires one (1) loader for the Maintenance yard.  This requirement also impacts the Riding Mountain Visitor Centre, and the residence for the park warden.  This is a reissue of a previous solicitation.  The closing date for this solicitation is September 1st, 2022.  Bidders may be contacted for a debriefing following the evaluation. Requests for a debriefing must be made within 15 working days from the time of notification of the bid result.  Sellers may also offer alternative period for debriefing by telephone or in person upon request.
tags: Loader, provision of maintenance support and operational support
full_summary:
Loader and Front End Loader Required for Riding Mountain National Park Project
=====================================

**Tender Details**

*   **Reference Number** : PW-22-01004608
*   **Solicitation Number** : 5P420-22-0044/B
*   **Publication Date** : August 17, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time** : September 1, 2022, at 16:00 MST
*   **Contracting Entity** : Parks Canada

**Notice Type and Method of Procurement**

This tender is a call for proposals, and the method of procurement is competitive-limited tendering. Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18LOAD/A.

**Goods Required**

Parks Canada requires one (1) Loader with front end capabilities. The requested delivery date for these goods is October 31, 2022.

**Eligibility Criteria**

Only suppliers holding a pre-qualified status under the RFSA (E60HS-18LOAD/A) or a current supplier under this agreement are eligible to participate in this tender. 

**Attachments**

To obtain full details of the tender, interested suppliers can download the bid solicitation documents at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/a7bcd4a8f193d9f4ef4e64a9373eb29a/5p420-22-0044_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/a7bcd4a8f193d9f4ef4e64a9373eb29a/5p420-22-0044_e.pdf) for English or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/98d90e8c6b087d1eca4fe384693d82b4/5p420-22-0044_f.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/98d90e8c6b087d1eca4fe384693d82b4/5p420-22-0044_f.pdf) for French.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Adam Tan
Contracting Authority
